general: Today, Gemini feels a strong creative energy thanks to the influence of Mercury, their ruling planet. It is an excellent time to express yourself and share your ideas. The exchanges will be particularly enriching, and you may make surprising discoveries about yourself.
love: Be open to communication, as it will strengthen your bonds.
work: Do not hesitate to present your ideas during meetings; they will be well received.
health: Engage in light physical activity to balance your mind and body.
advice: Let your curiosity guide you today.
